text: Max Merkel (7 December 1918 – 28 November 2006) was an Austrian footballer who played international football for both Germany and Austria as a defender. At club level, he played for Rapid Wien, Wiener SC, and Luftwaffen SV Markersdorf. ==Managerial honours== Rapid Wien * Austrian League: 1956–57 1860 Munich * Bundesliga: 1965–66 * DFB-Pokal: 1963–64 * European Cup Winners' Cup: Runners-up: 1964–65 1\. FC Nürnberg * Bundesliga: 1967–68 Atlético Madrid * Copa del Generalísimo: 1971–72 * Spanish League: 1972–73 ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austrian football managers Category:SK Rapid Wien players Category:SK Rapid Wien managers Category:FC Schalke 04 managers Category:Borussia Dortmund managers Category:1. title: Max Merkel
